title: Hale outlines macroeconomic pressures.
summary: In an appearance on Bloomberg TV's "The Pulse," Jeremy Hale, global macro strategist at Citi, discusses macroeconomic factors weighing on U.S. and European markets as well as policy options that could improve the outlook for growth.
tag-2: In an appearance on Bloomberg TV's "The Pulse," Jeremy Hale, global macro strategist at Citi, discusses macroeconomic factors weighing on U.S. and European markets as well as policy options that could improve the outlook for growth.
